description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nFinal Act of Judgment:
At the start of this creature's turn, it deals damage to enemies equal to 1% of their Current {STAT_health} for every 0.5% of {STAT_health} this creature is missing. The damage cannot exceed 35% of each creature's Current {STAT_health}.
name: Claymore of Judgment
